text:
January 10, 2018 / 8:03 AM / Updated 2 hours ago BRIEF-Hebei Sailhero Environmental's U.S. Unit Sunset Laboratory Merges With Cooper Environmental Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Hebei Sailhero Environmental Protection High-Tech Co Ltd: 
* SAYS ITS U.S. UNIT SUNSET LABORATORY INC MERGES WITH COOPER ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES LLC TO FORM SUNSET CES INCORPORATED Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CYwvuW Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
